static constexpr duration min();

static constexpr duration min() noexcept;
}}
{{dcl end}}

Returns a duration with the lowest possible value.

If the representation {{tt|rep}} of the duration requires some other implementation to return a minimum-length duration, {{lc|std::chrono::duration_values}} can be specialized to return the desired value.

===Parameters===
(none)

===Return value===
{{c|duration(std::chrono::duration_values&lt;rep&gt;::min())}}
